decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of the original permission, being 13/02/2015.
Reason:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: P102, P203 and P403
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

| The materials to be used for the external surfaces of the development (including elevations, roofs and hard-standing) shall be implemented in accordance with the details approved under planning application ref: PP/2015/5002, dated 15/10/2015 and permanently retained thereafter.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7b of the Development Management DPD, policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the adopted Core Strategy, and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2011)
| The Construction Strategy shall be implemented in accordance with the details approved under planning application ref: PP/2015/5003, dated 06/11/2015.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby occupiers, in accordance with policies 7.4 of the Development Management DPD, policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the adopted Core Strategy, and policies 7.4 and 7.15 of the London Plan (2011).

| Deleted | Notwithstanding the provisions of Classes A, B, C, D and E of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (as amended), no extensions or works shall be carried out without the prior permission of the Local Planning Authority, obtained through the submission of a planning application.

Reason: To prevent the overdevelopment of the site and to safeguard the living conditions of adjoining properties and visual appearance of the building having regard to policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2011) and 7.4 and 7b of the Ealing Development Management DPD.
description: Application for a Minor Material Amendment (S73.a) to vary condition 2 (approved drawings) and condition 5 (rear garden area) of planning permission ref: PP/2014/4455 dated 13/02/2015 for: Amendments to the approved scheme (PP/2013/2020) dated 18/12/13 for the construction of 3 No. three bedroom terraced houses (with accommodation in the roof space) with associated parking and cycle storage consisting of amendments to include internal alterations and increase in footprint of the three dwellinghouses. Amendment seeks to alter fenestration, elevations (door location and dormers), internal alterations to layout and changes to the garden landscaping. Amendment seeks to retain the three terraced houses (as-built) and existing garage.
